afterAgreementCreated(address,address,by.custom:note: - State changes is permitted. - Only revert with a "reason" is permitted.
afterAgreementCreated(address,address,by.details: Callback after a new agreement is created.

params.cbdata: The data returned from the before-hook callback.
params.superToken: The super token used for the agreement.

returns.newCtx: The current context of the transaction.

afterAgreementTerminated(address,address.custom:note: - State changes is permitted. - Revert is not permitted.
afterAgreementTerminated(address,address.details: Callback after a new agreement is terminated.

params.cbdata: The data returned from the before-hook callback.
params.superToken: The super token used for the agreement.

returns.newCtx: The current context of the transaction.

afterAgreementUpdated(address,address,by.custom:note: - State changes is permitted. - Only revert with a "reason" is permitted.
afterAgreementUpdated(address,address,by.details: Callback after a new agreement is updated.

params.cbdata: The data returned from the before-hook callback.
params.superToken: The super token used for the agreement.

returns.newCtx: The current context of the transaction.

beforeAgreementCreated(address,address,b.custom:note: - It will be invoked with `staticcall`, no state changes are permitted. - Only revert with a "reason" is permitted.
beforeAgreementCreated(address,address,b.details: Callback before a new agreement is created.

params.superToken: The super token used for the agreement.

returns.cbdata: A free format in memory data the app can use to pass          arbitary information to the after-hook callback.

beforeAgreementTerminated(address,addres.custom:note: - It will be invoked with `staticcall`, no state changes are permitted. - Revert is not permitted.
beforeAgreementTerminated(address,addres.details: Callback before a new agreement is terminated.

params.superToken: The super token used for the agreement.

returns.cbdata: A free format in memory data the app can use to pass arbitary information to         the after-hook callback.

beforeAgreementUpdated(address,address,b.custom:note: - It will be invoked with `staticcall`, no state changes are permitted. - Only revert with a "reason" is permitted.
beforeAgreementUpdated(address,address,b.details: Callback before a new agreement is updated.

params.superToken: The super token used for the agreement.

returns.cbdata: A free format in memory data the app can use to pass          arbitary information to the after-hook callback.
